author: The W.O.R.K.
title: THE BEEHIVE MENTALITY* CELL THE MOVIE* SATANIC GOV'T BEAST SYSTEM*CONTROL AND POWER*
text:
All glory and praise to The Most High and Christ. We pray that all of you are well...we have been praying for all of you that truly belong to Christ--- the whole body of Christ. The Satanic System has programmed all of us from a child to believe in lies. It has programmed us through entertainment, media etc., how we are to act--behave, dress, look, think, and feel, etc., However Christ sets us free through his truth, salvation and deliverance. Continue to pray for us, as we pray for all of you. We love all of our brothers and sisters in Christ in the true doctrine and that truly belong and are his sheep. Blessings and shalawam.
***SUBSCRIBE, SUBSCRIBE, SUBSCRIBE***

If you don't know Christ Yashaya (means my saviour, Matthew 1:21) turn to him while there is still time. Repent of your sins, get baptized in his true name according to Acts 2:38 read. Pray to Christ to join you with like minded brothers and sisters in the way of the true doctrine of Christ Yashaya. Where two or three are gathered together in his name, Christ will be in the midst. Matthew 18:20. If you don't know Christ's Hebrew name please watch video on the platform titled, THE TRUE NAME OF GOD AND CHRIST and WE'VE BEEN LIED TO.
